title: Eutectic-electrolyte-enabled zinc metal batteries towards wide temperature and voltage windows

Zinc metal batteries (ZMBs) are highly promising devices for large-scale energy storage applications. However, the commonly used aqueous electrolyte often leads to issues such as hydrogen evolution, narrow temperature range,...
